mapper.select: SELECT member_idx, id, password, nickname, auth_type, token, member_created_date, member_modified_date FROM member
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, password, nickname, auth_type, token, member_created_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{authType}, #{token}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, member_modified_date = now() WHERE member_idx = #{idx}
